ModMetaData.name: Ground Scanner Redesign - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Uuugggg
ModMetaData.description: Re-thinks how the Ground-penetrating scanner works. It builds area over time, and detects surface minerals as well. (This is the dev version of Ground Scanner Redesign. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
